summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 CHEVROLET TAHOE. THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V383000 (AIR BAGS). AFTER CONTACTING COURTESY CHEVROLET (2531 N SALISBURY BLVD, SALSBURY, MD) AND THE MANUFACTURER ON MULTIPLE OCCASIONS, THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED THAT THE PARTS NEEDED FOR THE RECALL REMEDY WERE STILL NOT AVAILABLE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.  *BF   CONSUMER STATED GM REP STATED THAT THERE WOULD BE NO REPLACEMENTS EVER, SAID THEIR OWN TESTING SHOWED NO PROBLEM.*JB
